__e: We were wrong to keep his illness from you. But you understand why it's important the others don't know.

No, I just don't want everyone finding out if I don't get in...
Wait, you're not gonna wait for them to come pick us up?
I have to call my children to pick me up, because I'm healthy.
He said they were in no hurry, that they would take their time to come after us.
Oh, I can't tell you who he is, but that's for your own protection, in case they come and question you.
No, I just don't want everyone finding out if I don't get in...
And them coming to live here now, that wasn't easy for you, I know.
Why don't you think other people come here?
I want them here so I get first drop.
There's no purpose in them coming after you here.
- No, I don't want them coming along on this trip anymore.

I don't know what happened, or where the money's from.
Make sure he doesn't snap and hurt somebody.
